Fit the beta eCAVIAR model for a signal cluster

fitBetaEcaviar.Rd

Fit the beta eCAVIAR model for a signal cluster

fitBetaEcaviar(nsnp, beta_hat_a, beta_hat_b, se_a, se_b, Sigma_a, Sigma_b, ...)

Arguments

nsnp

number of SNPs
beta_hat_a

vector of length nsnp, estimated coefficients for A
beta_hat_b

" " for B
se_a

vector of length nsnp, standard errors for beta_hat_a
se_b

" " for beta_hat_b
Sigma_a

correlation matrix of SNPs for A, dimension should be nsnp x nsnp
Sigma_b

" " for B (this could be different for different LD structures)
...

further arguments passed to rstan::sampling
